SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.alljoyn.bus.annotation
Annotation Type BusInterface

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface BusInterface

Indicates that a given Java interface is also an AllJoyn interface. AllJoyn interfaces contain AllJoyn methods and AllJoyn signals which are exposed to external applications.

Optional Element Summary
 String description
          This interface's description
 String descriptionLanguage
          This interface's description language
 String descriptionTranslator
          Class name of an org.alljoyn.bus.Translator instance used to translate this interface's descriptions
 String name
          Override of the default interface name.
 

name

public abstract String name
Override of the default interface name. The default AllJoyn interface name is the fully qualified name of the Java interface. The override may be used to specify the explicit AllJoyn interface name.

Default:
""

descriptionLanguage

public abstract String descriptionLanguage
This interface's description language

Default:
""

description

public abstract String description
This interface's description

Default:
""

descriptionTranslator

public abstract String descriptionTranslator
Class name of an org.alljoyn.bus.Translator instance used to translate this interface's descriptions

Default:
""
